title: Equiv capacitance - 3 vs 2 capacitors in series

content.question: The figure shows two sets of identical capacitors. What is the ratio <math alttext="C sub equivalent, comma B, end sub, to C sub equivalent, comma A, end sub" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>C</mi><mtext>eq,B</mtext></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mi>C</mi><mtext>eq,A</mtext></msub></math> of the equivalent capacitance of Capacitor Set <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></math> to that of Set <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math>?

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
